comments.author: keenedge.9675
comments.body: Would it help anyone to have a list of item #s from the next time I make a pass at the table ?

comments.author: Lawton Campbell.8517
comments.body:
Looks like it might be a cache issue between some of the backend servers — one server reports the item as having listings, but the listing server responsible for the item is tossing back “Unknown Item”.

I’ll ping the people who maintain that machinery.

comments.author: keenedge.9675
comments.body:
I got a few 400 errors, instead of 404 for some items. I checked in-game using the item title and find that the black lion listing progress keeps spinning and doesn’t load the buy/sell listings for the same items. “Fur-Lined Helm” lvl 20(3954), for example. The description does show in game like it does from the items api. ( item ids 3954, 3955, 3956 ) all behave the same way.

Perhaps there’s an inconsistency in the database somewhere . . .

Is this the proper venue for these observations ?
